sourcesContent: import{jsx as r}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{translate as i}from"@aws-amplify/ui";import{View as e}from"../../../primitives/View/View.js";import{Text as t}from"../../../primitives/Text/Text.js";const o=({errors:o,id:m})=>(null==o?void 0:o.length)>0?r(e,Object.assign({"data-amplify-sign-up-errors":!0,id:m},{children:o.map((e=>r(t,Object.assign({role:"alert",variation:"error"},{children:i(e)}),e)))})):null;export{o as ValidationErrors};
